Back to Works by composer

Alexander Scriabin

1872–1915

Works overview · Works by difficulty · Recommended editions

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Works without opus numbers are identified by the catalogue of Daniel Bosshard. See also works ordered by the Bosshard catalogue and incipits of unfinished works.

  • Sonatas
  • Sonata no. 1 in F minor, op. 6
  • Sonata no. 2 in G-sharp minor, op. 19 (Sonate-fantaisie)
  • Sonata no. 3 in F-sharp minor, op. 23
  • Sonata no. 4 in F-sharp major, op. 30
  • Sonata no. 5, op. 53
  • Sonata no. 6, op. 62
  • Sonata no. 7, op. 64 (Messe blanche)

  • Sonata no. 9, op. 68 (Messe noire)
  • Sonata no. 10, op. 70

  • Sonata in C-sharp minor, Anh. 11
  • Études
  • Douze Études, op. 8

  • Huit Études, op. 42
  • Trois Études, op. 65

  • The Trois Morceaux, op. 2 (no. 1), Trois Morceaux, op. 49 (no. 1) and Quatre Morceaux, op. 56 (no. 4) also contain études.
  • Impromptus
  • Deux Impromptus à la mazur, op. 7
  • Deux Impromptus, op. 10
  • Deux Impromptus, op. 12
  • Deux Impromptus, op. 14
  • The Trois Morceaux, op. 2 (no. 3) also contain an impromptu à la mazur; there is also a Valse-Impromptu, Anh. 13.
  • Mazurkas
  • Dix Mazurkas, op. 3
  • Neuf Mazurkas, op. 25
  • Deux Mazurkas, op. 40
  • Mazurka in B minor, WoO 14

  • Mazurka in F major, WoO 16
  • The Trois Morceaux, op. 2 (no. 3) and Deux Impromptus à la mazur, op. 7 also contain impromptus à la mazur.

  • The Trois Morceaux, op. 45 (no. 2), Quatre Morceaux, op. 51 (no. 3), Trois Morceaux, op. 52 (nos. 1 and 3) and Deux Morceaux, op. 59 (no. 1) also contain poèmes.

  • Cinq Préludes, op. 74
  • The Trois Morceaux, op. 2 (no. 2), Prélude et nocturne, op. 9 (no. 1), Trois Morceaux, op. 45 (no. 3), Trois Morceaux, op. 49 (no. 2), Quatre Morceaux, op. 51 (no. 2), Quatre Morceaux, op. 56 (no. 1) and Deux Morceaux, op. 59 (no. 2) also contain préludes.
